original_text: Abram took back everything that those men had taken from Sodom. He also brought back his nephew Lot, together with the women and the other people.
korean_text: 모든 빼앗겼던 재물과 자기의 조카 롯과 그의 재물과 또 부녀와 친척을 다 찾아왔더라

sentences.original_text: that those men had taken from Sodom
He also brought back his nephew Lot
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 그의 조카 롯을 데려왔습니다

sentences.original_text: together with the women and the other people
